dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 3567 IH: HMDA Repeal Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Brat (for himself and Mr. Chabot) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To repeal the Home Mortgage Disclosure Act of 1975, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the HMDA Repeal Act of 2015.

section.header: Repeal of the Home Mortgage Disclosure Act of 1975

subsection.text: The Home Mortgage Disclosure Act of 1975 (12 U.S.C. 2801 et seq.) is repealed.

paragraph.text: Section 10(k)(1) of the Federal Home Loan Bank Act (12 U.S.C. 1430(k)(1)) is amended by striking subparagraph (B) and redesignating subparagraph (C) as subparagraph (B).

paragraph.header: Housing and Community Development Act of 1992
paragraph.text: The Housing and Community Development Act of 1992 (12 U.S.C. 4501 et seq.) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in section 1323(a), by striking paragraph (2) (relating to Census tract level reporting);
in section 1326, by amending subsection (d) to read as follows:

subsection.text: Subject to privacy considerations, the Director shall, by regulation or order, provide that certain information relating to single family mortgage data of the enterprises shall be disclosed to the public, in order to make available to the public information collected by the Director under section 1324(b)(6).

subclause.text: by striking and for which information under the Home Mortgage Disclosure Act of 1975 is publicly available;
in clause (i), by striking , or and inserting ; or;
in clause (ii), by striking the comma at the end and inserting a period; and
by striking the matter after and below clause (ii); and

paragraph.header: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act
paragraph.text: The Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (12 U.S.C. 5301 et seq.) is amended—

clause.text: by redesignating subparagraphs (L) through (R) as subparagraphs (K) through (Q), respectively; and

subparagraph.text: in section 1013(c)(2)(A), by striking and the Home Mortgage Disclosure Act.
